abstract: “America’s Got Talent” continued to boost NBC in the ratings on Wednesday, making the network No. 1 for the night. According to Nielsen’s estimates, the reality talent show averaged 10.1 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m. while its closest competitor, CBS’s rerun of “Criminal Minds” delivered about two thirds that audience, 6.7 million viewers at 9 p.m.

lead_paragraph: “America’s Got Talent” continued to boost NBC in the ratings on Wednesday, making the network No. 1 for the night. According to Nielsen’s estimates, the talent show averaged 10.1 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m. while its closest competitor, CBS’s rerun of “Criminal Minds” delivered about two thirds that audience, 6.7 million viewers at 9 p.m.
